short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGpt Popup is a chrome extension that allows users to chat with ChatGpt.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
ChatGpt Popup is a chrome extension that provides quick access to ChatGpt's AI language model on any webpage. Users can open the extension popup on any page using a shortcut key or by selecting text, and can ask any question in two modes - chatGpt and GPT-3.

Features:
- Supports all popular search engines Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, ...
- Supports official OpenAI API
- Simple access via shortcut key "ctrl + m" or text selection
- Icon in right bottom of page for easy access
- Extension popup to ask any question
- Two modes - chatGpt and GPT-3
- chatGpt mode can answer follow-up questions
- GPT-3 mode is faster and more stable.

Source code: 
- https://github.com/longpddev/chatgpt-google-extension
- https://github.com/wong2/chat-gpt-google-extension
long.de,es,fr,he,hu,ko,pt_PT,ro,ru,uk,zh_CN:
